item.title: Overview of Neural Networks
item.description: Edit: This blog post is a duplicate of my Medium post. Here is the link . Artificial Intelligence is so popular in our world. If you are interested in AI, You would probably know the existence of an Artificial Neural Network. Do you wanna know basically what is a neural network? Then come and dive into Neural networks by this article. Table of Contents What is Neural Network Which areas do we use NNs?
